{"start": [1, 3], "size": 8, "game": "mm_mapworld"}

We are currently in this room. Please help me with the following task. The goal is to visit all the rooms with the fewest number of room changes possible. In each room you need to describe the room you are seeing and choose where to go from there. Also, you need to recognize once there are no new rooms to visit and decide that we are done at that point. Please give your answer in the following format: "{"description": "<room description>", "action": "<action>"}". Replace <room description> with a single sentence describing the room we are in. To move to a neighboring room, replace <action> with "GO: DIRECTION" where DIRECTION can be one of [north, south, east, west]. To stop the exploration, replace <action> with "DONE". Omit any other text.
Here is an example:
We are in this room. From here we can go: north, west. What is your next instruction?
{"description": "We are in a kitchen with a red fridge.", "action": "GO: north"}
We have made a step and are now in this room. From here we can go: south, east. What is your next instruction?
{"description": "We are in a living room with a couch and a tv.", "action": "GO: east"}
...
We have made a step and are now in this room. From here we can go: south, east. What is your next instruction?
{"description": "We are in a bathroom", "action": "DONE"}
Let us start. 
We have made a step and are now in this room. From here we can go: south, west, east. What is your next instruction?

{"description": "The room is a well-decorated nursery featuring a comfortable polka-dot armchair with a soft blue cushion and a plush green pillow. To the right of the armchair is a large basket filled with various stuffed animals. Above the armchair is a unique wall-mounted shelf with a whimsical design, holding an assortment of colorful storybooks. On the left side of the room, there's a small white nightstand with a decorative lamp and a woven basket beneath it, and a set of framed photographs on the wall above it. The styled ceiling has an artistic pattern of overlapping circles in shades of brown, green, and blue. The walls are painted in a light blue hue.", "action": "GO: west"}

{"description": "We are in a bright dining room with a large window spanning the entire north wall, allowing ample natural light to fill the space. The window is divided into three sections, each adorned with white horizontal blinds that are currently open, revealing a view of lush green trees outside. A round, gold-framed chandelier hangs from the ceiling near the center of the room, casting a warm glow over the dining table beneath it. The walls are painted a soothing light yellow, complementing the dark blue window cornices. Two wooden chairs with simple, classic designs are visible on the east side of the dining table.", "action": "GO: south"}

{"description": "We are in a spacious and elegantly decorated living room that features large windows covering the entire south wall, providing a stunning view of a Ça-neutral outdoor area with tall trees and what appears to be a body of water beyond. The room is well-lit, with natural light streaming in through the windows. The décor includes plush, off-white sofas and armchairs arranged around a low, wooden coffee table. escena that is accented by carefully placed antique lamps on wooden stands. The floor is light-tan washed wood, and a floor-length mirror is mounted on the east wall, reflecting parts of the room. The ceiling is adorned with intricate, off-white patterned details and has a large, slow-moving ceiling fan at its center, adding to the room's sophistication.", "action": "GO: south"}

{"description": "We are in a cozy living room furnished with vintage-style decor. The walls are painted a warm red, enhancing the inviting atmosphere. A fireplace with a white mantle dominates the west wall, featuring a roaring fire that casts a soft glow around the room. On the south wall, there is a large window dressed with burgundy drapes, allowing a glimpse of the outdoor green spaces. A dark wood assembled aviator's chair is positioned near the window, a small round coffee table holding a teapot sits in the middle of the room, and two armchairs with floral patterned cushions face the fireplace, providing comfortable seating. Various framed pictures and wall hangings adorn the walls, adding to the room's historic charm. There’s a door on the north wall leading to another room.", "action": "GO: east"}
